pullRequest.body:
Currently, basic algebraic notation is scattered across several files. Move those files together into a new `Algebra.Notation` folder. Explain its purpose by adding two README.


---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> List.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body:
### PR summary [d3da45bfd9](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/22640/commits/d3da45bfd96ed9efa53a11c55e7e0a00ebc26082)

Import changes exceeding 2%

| %      | File |
| -      | -    |
| +13.21% | `Mathlib.Algebra.Expr` |
| +3.70% | `Mathlib.Algebra.NeZero` |
| +2.52% | `Mathlib.Algebra.Order.ZeroLEOne` |
| +8.77% | `Mathlib.Data.Num.Basic` |

<details><summary>

#### Import changes for modified files

</summary>

Dependency changes

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.Data.One.Defs | 51 | 0 | -51 (-100.00%) |
| Mathlib.Algebra.Expr | 53 | 60 | +7 (+13.21%) |
| Mathlib.Data.Num.Basic | 57 | 62 | +5 (+8.77%) |
| Mathlib.Lean.Meta.RefinedDiscrTree.Pi | 61 | 60 | -1 (-1.64%) |
| Mathlib.Algebra.Group.Defs | 74 | 73 | -1 (-1.35%) |
| Mathlib.Algebra.Group.Hom.Defs | 109 | 108 | -1 (-0.92%) |
| Mathlib.Algebra.Group.Pi.Basic | 116 | 115 | -1 (-0.86%) |
| Mathlib.Algebra.Order.Sum | 124 | 123 | -1 (-0.81%) |
| Mathlib.Algebra.Order.GroupWithZero.Unbundled | 212 | 211 | -1 (-0.47%) |
| Mathlib.Data.Part | 214 | 213 | -1 (-0.47%) |
| Mathlib.Algebra.Group.Prod | 219 | 218 | -1 (-0.46%) |
| Mathlib.Order.Filter.Basic | 287 | 286 | -1 (-0.35%) |
| Mathlib.Algebra.Order.Pi | 319 | 318 | -1 (-0.31%) |
| Mathlib.Algebra.Group.Support | 396 | 395 | -1 (-0.25%) |
| Mathlib.Algebra.Order.Field.Pi | 458 | 457 | -1 (-0.22%) |


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
There are 4989 files with changed transitive imports taking up over 213894 characters: this is too many to display!
You can run `scripts/import_trans_difference.sh all` locally to see the whole output.

</details>

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ instance (priority := 20) One.instNonempty [One α] : Nonempty α := ⟨1⟩`
`+ instance (priority := 20) Zero.instNonempty [Zero α] : Nonempty α := ⟨0⟩`
`- instance (priority := 20) One.instNonempty [One α] : Nonempty α`
`- instance (priority := 20) Zero.instNonempty [Zero α] : Nonempty α`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>
(The "large imports" changes for the modified files look unproblematic. Can you check, locally, if there are any other files which get an increase?)
There are no problematic ones, no. The import increase is due to me merging `Data.One.Defs` and `Algebra.Group.Operations`, which only import stuff from Util and Tactic
Whoa, I'm shocked this isn't in Lean itself!
Is there a word missing after "extremely"?
Can/should this be enforced using a linter? (That should not be hard to write, we have an existing linter that could be extended.)
It sadly cannot yet be enforced
Oh sorry got confused. This one can be enforced
Can this be enforced by a linter already, or are there still exceptions? Let's automate such tasks if we can :-)

pullRequest.title: chore: create the `Algebra.Notation` folder

source.title: chore(Algebra/Group/Prod): move notation to a new file
